summary.span: 實作 [Microsoft XPath 擴充程式函式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943)。

returns.span: 包含日期/時間資訊的字串。

span.span: A string that contains date/time information.

returns.span: 若字串無法解譯為有效的 XSD 日期/時間相關格式，就會傳回空字串。

span.span: If a string cannot be interpreted as a valid XSD date/time-related format, it returns an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將日期/時間相關的值轉換成國際標準時間，並可以排序和比較辭典編纂順序為固定 （標準化） 表示法。Converts date/time-related values into Coordinated Universal Time and into a fixed (normalized) representation that can be sorted and compared lexicographically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 找出 (s1)，在字串內子字串 (s2)，並在 s2 之後發生 s1 中傳回的字元。Locates a substring (s2) within a string (s1), and returns the characters in s1 that occur after s2.

param.name: arg
param.span: 原始字串。

span.span: The original string.

param.name: mapString
param.span: 應該以 transString 取代之 arg 中的子字串。

span.span: The substring in arg that should be replaced with transString.

param.name: transString
param.span: 用來取代 mapString 的字串。

span.span: The string to replace mapString with.

summary.span: 根據 [W3C 規格](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873) (英文) 實作 XPath 函式。

span.span: Implements XPath function according to the [W3C specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).

returns.span: 為 的轉譯值。

span.span: The translated value as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將字串轉換 (`arg`) 來取代子字串中的字元 (`mapString`) 與另一個字串中的字元 (`tranString`)。Converts a string (`arg`) by replacing the characters in a substring (`mapString`) with the characters in another string (`tranString`).
